mapper.update: update unimall_coupon set surplus = surplus - 1 where id = #{couponId}
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.title, c.type, c.description, c.total, c.surplus, c.`limit`, c.discount, c.`min`, c.`status`, c.category_id AS categoryId, c.days, c.gmt_start AS gmtStart, c.gmt_end AS gmtEnt, c.gmt_update AS gmtUpdate, c.gmt_create AS gmtCreate, y.title AS categoryTitle FROM unimall_coupon AS c LEFT JOIN unimall_category AS y ON y.id = c.category_id WHERE c.`status` = 1 AND (c.gmt_end IS NULL OR ( c.gmt_start > now( ) AND c.gmt_end < now( ) ))
